name: Shariki (richardypaloma)
description:
Shariki (Bolas). Un "match three game", precursor de juegos como Bejeweled o Candy Crush. Idea Original de Eugene Alemzhin (1994).

---

Shariki (Balls). A "match three game", a precursor to games like Bejeweled or Candy Crush. Original Idea by Eugene Alemzhin (1994).
